__e: Extremely manoeuvrable, sleeping up to 6 with a rear bed, sofa bed and a dinette bed along with an over the cab bed for the kids.

Having a total of 113 apartments, 95 one bedroom and 18 two bedrooms all have a large terrace offering Mediterranean or mountain views, air-conditioner , living room with a sofa bed and flat screen satellite TV, modern kitchen, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

This apartment features a seating area with a sofa bed and a dining area.
